title: Urami-san wa Kyou mo Ayaui
original_name: 浦見さんは今日も危うい
sinopse:
Haruto Satou, a 15-year-old with a good personality, as well as good at sports, had an important childhood friend that could not be forgotten—one who was bright and active, Masuna Urami. Even though they meet again in high school, she had drastically changed...

(Source: MU)
